Title: Rifting Apart
Writer: Bryan Edward Hill, Ivan Raimi (developed for television by), Sam Raimi (developed for television by), Tom Spezialy (developed for television by)
Actors: Bruce Campbell, Ray Santiago, Dana DeLorenzo, Arielle Carver-O'Neill
Plot: Ash and Pablo realize that rift in the cellar is the key to saving humanity, and devise a plan to save the ones they love.
